A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw it Sunday\, Hamil and Fisher steal the show. Everyone was great. Didn't know Del Toro was in it\, was happy to see him. I thought Rey should have been directed better\, she doesn't change in any of the films; she's a strong confident character with no depth. I do hate to say that\, because I don't feel its the actors fault\, maybe bad directing or bad writing and/or an unfortunate attempt to please the hyper sensitive. Obviously these are watered down internationally focused films being made in an era of\, possibly\, well meaning pc crazies\, but I still support the film's overall tone of morality and love. An adult star wars franchise would be pretty rad. Not a bot. Made this account to counter the trolls and defend a great film with a great cast. Thanks.
